Package com.example.jobappbackend.service

Class OfferService

java.lang.Object
com.example.jobappbackend.service.OfferService
@Service public class OfferService extends Object
Service class for managing job offers created by companies.

  • Method Details

    • createOffer

      public OfferResponse createOffer(OfferRequest request, Long companyUserId)
      Creates a new job offer for a given company (user).
      Parameters:
      request - the offer data
      companyUserId - the user ID of the company creating the offer
      Returns:
      the created offer as a response DTO

    • getOffersByCompany

      public List<OfferResponse> getOffersByCompany(Long companyUserId)
      Retrieves all job offers created by a specific company.
      Parameters:
      companyUserId - the user ID of the company
      Returns:
      a list of offers

    • updateOffer

      public OfferResponse updateOffer(Long id, OfferRequest request, Long companyUserId)
      Updates an existing job offer.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the offer to update
      request - the updated offer data
      companyUserId - the user ID of the company requesting the update
      Returns:
      the updated offer

    • deleteOffer

      public void deleteOffer(Long id, Long companyUserId)
      Deletes an offer by ID if it belongs to the specified company.
      Parameters:
      id - the offer ID
      companyUserId - the username of the company performing the deletion

    • getOfferById

      public OfferResponse getOfferById(Long id)
      Retrieves a single job offer by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the offer ID
      Returns:
      the corresponding OfferResponse DTO

    • getAllOffers

      public List<OfferResponse> getAllOffers(String studentUsername)
      Retrieves all job offers and adds 'applied' info for the connected student.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - the username of the student
      Returns:
      list of offers with applied status
